stages.logText: Facutloni asked me to help him deliver all of the items ordered by his customers a long time ago. He even gave me an old document with the names and items written on it.
Arcir the Fallhaven book-lover ordered 'Dusty Old book'.
Edrin the Brimhaven metalsmith ordered 'Striped Hammer'.
Odirath the Stoutford armorer ordered 'Pretty Porcelain Figure'.
Venanra the Brimhaven laundress ordered 'Old, worn cape'.
Tjure the unlucky Brimhaven merchant ordered 'Mysterious green something'.
Servant the Guynmart servant ordered 'Chandelier'.
Arghes at Remgard tavern ordered 'Yellow boot'.
Wyre the mournful Vilegard woman ordered 'Lyre'.
Mikhail ordered 'Plush Pillow'.
Pangitain the Brimhaven fortune teller ordered 'Crystal Globe'.
Facutloni wants me to report back after the delivery.
I reported back to Facutloni. He is very glad.
I delivered 'Dusty Old book'
I delivered 'Striped Hammer'
I delivered 'Pretty Porcelain Figure'
I delivered 'Old, worn cape'
I delivered 'Mysterious green something'
I delivered 'Chandelier'
I delivered 'Yellow boot'
I delivered 'Lyre'
I delivered 'Plush Pillow'
I delivered 'Crystal Globe'

name: Gold and Exp reward for Delivery quest completed - nondisplay

stages.logText: Not yet done.
Done. But haven't received gold and exp reward yet.
Done. I received gold and exp reward. Old scrooge again.
